large_face: That face is so big, it has its own zip code!
Your face called - it wants its own area code!
small_face: I need a magnifying glass to see your features!
Your face is so small, it could fit in a locket!
Did you shrink in the wash?
glasses: Those glasses are so thick, you can see into the future!
Are those glasses or telescope lenses?
I bet you can see atoms with those things!

low_resolution: This photo has fewer pixels than my patience!
Did you take this with a potato?
I've seen clearer images on a foggy day!
dark_photo: This photo is darker than my sense of humor!
Did you take this in a cave?
I need night vision goggles to see you!
bright_photo: This photo is brighter than your future!
Did you stare directly into the sun?
I need sunglasses to look at this!

multiple_people: Which one are you supposed to be?
Is this a group photo or a police lineup?
selfie: Your arm must be tired from all these selfies!
The front camera is not your friend!

generic: I've heard better comebacks from a broken boomerang!
Nice try, but I've seen sharper wit on a butter knife!
Is that your final answer or are you still loading?
I'd agree with you, but then we'd both be wrong!
defensive: Defensive much? I hit a nerve!
Did I strike a chord or a whole orchestra?
